name: react-jsonr-monorepo
description: Monorepo for React JSONR - a plugin-based JSON to React component renderer

scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter react-jsonr build && pnpm --filter docs build
scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +

author: Saatvik Arya <aryasaatvik@gmail.com>
